title: The music team seriously needs to chill the hell out
body:
They seriously must be non-stop snorting crack cocaine to be this good at their jobs.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5GC3XzERhxU&feature=youtu.be&a=
It is almost TOO good to be a singular champion's theme, it should be the Worlds 2018 theme lol.

replies.body:
dude it sounds like the most god damn inspirational music of all time. It's like when all of your teammates are dead and then you are left to fend off the game and you take your last ground start to channel your inner chmapion. 


And 1v5 but lol your a janna sup. 


GG

if enemy team decides to kill you in ur own fountain, it's theoractically possible to 1vs5 if you can coordinate Q flash R Q combo perfectly on 5 people, given all 5 people are at under 1k hp and are somehow stupid enough to position themselves for janna Q&R in a straight line or similar. Happened to me once on a smurf account but only quadra.

Gameplay aside, i think it's more like you are a 30/0/1 zed ready to 1vs5 the entire enemy team in their own fountain.

> [{quoted}](name=Hide On Top Bush,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XL5Qd9MT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-18T03:38:07.300+0000)
>
> dude it sounds like the most god damn inspirational music of all time. It's like when all of your teammates are dead and then you are left to fend off the game and you take your last ground start to channel your inner chmapion. 
> 
> 
> And 1v5 but lol your a janna sup. 
> 
> 
> GG

Janna can carry ;-;

> [{quoted}](name=Czeslaw,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XL5Qd9MT,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-18T03:34:32.825+0000)
>
> They seriously must be non-stop snorting crack cocaine to be this good at their jobs.

~~Take a few notes, balance team.~~

Those guys are always on fire! i have a playlist made entirely of league of legend's themes!

its like every single theme tells the story of a champion! its clear they put so much effort into making sure the music delivers that feeling.

On the other hand Irelia deserves this epic theme! it's so fitting for her character,her lore and her region and it just adds to the success of her VGU for me!
could u send a link to that playlist. Too lazy to make my :P {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

There is the soundcloud that has pretty much everything ever released by riot(aside from some of the songs like ignite and legends never die since that doesn't belong to them). 

https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends
Hey :D I'm sorry but these are just MP3 files on my phone,not an online playlist :( i would share otherwise. ( i couldnt find FLAC so i had to settle for MP3)
I hope Irelia VGU is godlike. I already love her kit as it is...
too bad the balance team isn't as good at their job.

I am sorry guys, but there is only one true LoL theme:

https://youtu.be/F8cPDpXnQa0 

{{champion:201}} 

The epitome of stache-y magnificence composed as a beautiful piece of music.
It simply cannot become any better than this
He is, bar none, the best part of League. That shield hit sound is like drugs for my ears.
I feel like i'm about to play Hearthstone with his login lol

You guys all do amazing work, my favorite themes are Taliyah, Xayah and Rakan, Elementalist Lux and Star Guardian Gen1.
They are such great no tilt tunes.

Kindreds is also very spooky yet enchanting.
Further proof that the music team has to much cocaine

This was Scherzo's work, who also happens to be responsible Bligewater, Diana, Ivern, and tons of other great stuff. He's a die hard Irelia player and if you ever meet him top lane... run.

Scherzo also wrote a dev blog on music recently: https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2018/03/dev-unorthodox-instruments-and-new-sheet-music/
Bilgewater is some of my favourite pirate music ever made. I love it to bits

Am i the only one missing something or what? This sounds nothing special to me. It's pretty generic stuff to me and exactly what Ionia has always been like. It doesn't have any emotional growth in it either so i feel absolutely nothing when listening to this.

Very generic, and nothing special to me. I don't see what people see in this. Worlds Collide was amazing to me and so was Warriors but this would need some adjusting so there could be an actual peak to the song not just repetition and twists on said repetition. It''s not exactly awe-inspiring as Ionia has always been the Asia of League of Legends and this just lives up to that but it doesn't make me get goosebumps or anything like that at all given it lacks unsettling themes, both positive and negative.

I'm just saying this song lacks a crescendo while actual Worlds songs don't.

Even if i don't like Zedd:Ignite..

> I'm just saying this song lacks a crescendo while actual Worlds songs don't.

It's really necessary for a song to have a crescendo? And i felt like all the first half was a culmination already.

In my preference, yes when it comes to songs that are going for grandiose performances such as this. The first half was more like a build-up by alternating between styles whilst using the same tune in general. The peak which comes at the end doesn't seem to be any different than the melody at the beginning, it's simply louder and supported by additional instruments but it doesn't change it up to be an actual crescendo.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XL5Qd9MT,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-03-18T14:22:39.498+0000)
>
> Am i the only one missing something or what? This sounds nothing special to me. It's pretty generic stuff to me and exactly what Ionia has always been like. It doesn't have any emotional growth in it either so i feel absolutely nothing when listening to this.
> 
> Very generic, and nothing special to me. I don't see what people see in this. Worlds Collide was amazing to me and so was Warriors but this would need some adjusting so there could be an actual peak to the song not just repetition and twists on said repetition. It''s not exactly awe-inspiring as Ionia has always been the Asia of League of Legends and this just lives up to that but it doesn't make me get goosebumps or anything like that at all given it lacks unsettling themes, both positive and negative.
> 
> I'm just saying this song lacks a crescendo while actual Worlds songs don't.
> 
> Even if i don't like Zedd:Ignite..

2 minutes in and 3:40, it does have a crescendo, feels like you judged a book by its cover before reading all the way through the first chapter.

Yes, technically, and i listened through all of it except that that crescendo appears to be nothing more than just another variation on the same melody that the song's been spinning for the past 2 minutes just with more support and louder.

I'm not trying to put down the song, it just doesn't seem as exciting to me as it does to everyone else, spitting their drinks over this for some reason.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XL5Qd9MT,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-03-18T14:22:39.498+0000)
>
> Am i the only one missing something or what? This sounds nothing special to me. It's pretty generic stuff to me and exactly what Ionia has always been like. It doesn't have any emotional growth in it either so i feel absolutely nothing when listening to this.

Worlds Collide was amazing to me and so was Warriors but this would need some adjusting so there could be an actual peak to the song not just repetition and twists on said repetition. It''s not exactly awe-inspiring as Ionia has always been the Asia of League of Legends and this just lives up to that but it doesn't make me get goosebumps or anything like that at all given it lacks unsettling themes, both positive and negative.

> 
> Even if i don't like Zedd:Ignite..

My favorite music has always been The bilgewater and Aurelion Sol themes

Its not THAT impressive.
I've been listening to similar stuff for like 10 years or so.
Its good, but not "omg this shit is insane, there's no way you could've made this"

For fuck's sake
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i_zIwRY6V30

was produced by a waaaaaaaaay smaller team.
i'm not sure how similarities is relevant here. being similar doesnt mean its good any less or more.

its relevant because riot should make things this good or better all the time
if a hentai game visual novel had similar or better quality in audio, riot can do better

I think you missunderstand me, im saying if two things are similar doesn't mean one of them is worthless just because one like it already exists!

The similar songs you like are good, but it doesn't mean Irelia theme is not great and epic!

my point is: riot should make ALL their songs at least this quality or better
since people could do similar quality with fewer manpower

tho few people care apparently get this and they just get butthurt someone criticizes riot

But theyv already do make it all same quality or better.

If someone doesnt agree with your view on this doesnt make them butthurt xD

no they don't (riot)
and that's what makes those people butthurt. Not that they don't agree with me, but that they think riot is already doing a marvelous job every time, when they do not.

"produced by a waaaaaaaaay smaller team." 

Excuse me but Touhou is written, drawn, programmed and composed by 
ONE MAN (and an obscene amount of beer.) The only thing ZUN doesn't do is play-test. And it's still better than Nasu.

fair enough, each with their own picks :)
still, smaller teams > what riot produced in the past

so, the point is, riot should step up their game by a lot
this song in a step in the right direction, but not the "omg the best shit ever"

> [{quoted}](name=Serika Zero,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XL5Qd9MT,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-03-18T13:15:43.094+0000)

> I've been listening to similar stuff for like 10 years or so.
> Its good, but not "omg this shit is insane, there's no way you could've made this"

> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i_zIwRY6V30
> 
> was produced by a waaaaaaaaay smaller team.

"This piece of music which is completely different, and worse in terms of sound quality is better because fewer people made it."
It's a shame Rito will probably never make an MMO to put this music to good use.
Waiting for the next album compilation :O

Holy FUCK!

WHY IS IT SO GOOD! WHY!?!?! RIOT WHY CAN'T YOUR GAME BE AS GOOD AS YOUR MUSIC!!!!!!
Urgod bless the entirety of Riot's music team.
